: : Rodimus Prime/Kup/Darkangel/DeathStar/Wolfenstein : :

While Kup, Wolfenstein and the Tripreds returned to their respective bases for repairs, Rodimus stayed where he was. He had to monitor this confrontation between Hydras and Megatron.

Rodimus Prime: Enough arguing! When we dont have to worry about Unicron eating the very planet we're on and destroying history you two can rip each other apart. Right now we're allies. Now as for the Malice situation... There are those in my ranks who love him and I want him back. I'll work a way eventually. Killing his minion lover isn't a good way. That would only confirm us as the enemy and secure their brainwashing.


airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
Hydras:

"I'll do.."said camly the male"But this time I'm telling the true"

wrote:
> Megatron Revived:
>

my sister alone!"
>

I'm

<P>While Kup, Wolfenstein and the Tripreds returned to their respective bases for repairs, Rodimus stayed where he was. He had to monitor this confrontation between Hydras and Megatron.</P>
<P><STRONG>Rodimus Prime: </STRONG>Enough arguing! When we dont have to worry about Unicron eating the very planet we're on and destroying history you two can rip each other apart. Right now we're allies. Now as for the Malice situation... There are those in my ranks who love him and I want him back. I'll work a way eventually. Killing his minion lover isn't a good way. That would only confirm us as the enemy and secure their brainwashing.</P>
